translations.translation: Ordering an MX PLAN
In order to configure an MX plan you need at least one domain.
1. MX Plan configuration
Domain
Type of sevice
An error occurred when recovering your order details ({0}).
2. Select a service
For more information, please see our product descriptions. {2}
An error has occurred while retrieving the available durations.
An error occurred when searching for available prices for this duration.
Once you have paid the purchase order, the service will be reattached to your domain name for an unlimited duration. No renewal necessary.
3. Validation
I confirm that I have read and fully understood the terms and conditions.
Click on "Generate the purchase order" to order your MX Plan.
Please read and confirm the terms and conditions below, then click on "Generate the purchase order":
Generate purchase order
Generating the order...
The order was generated successfully.
To confirm your order please click the "Pay" button below.
Pay
A new tab will open and you will automatically be redirected to the OVH payment interface.
An error occurred during the generation of a purchase order.
